content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone-furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner-inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner-inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
-  Stone-furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore-pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam-engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt-group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5), transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5), and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe system at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe-group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe-group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Example: Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) has a status of NO_FUEL.

### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them.
- Example: Stone-furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0) has a status of NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a boiler before using them.
- Example: Steam-engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5) has a status of NOT_CONNECTED.

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before using them.
- Example: Electricity-group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668) has a status of NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK.

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before using them.
- Example: Pipe-group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) has a status of EMPTY.

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty before using them.
- Example: Belt-group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) has a status of EMPTY.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
